text:
Looking at the profile of a user in the admin/user GUI I can not see whether the
user is a LDPAP user or not. However this might be helpful for admins of a
publication to track down problems whith authentication (what happend to us
recently ....) i.e. wheter they are caused cms internally or by the LDAP server.

The iml File for a LdapUser might look like

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<identity class="org.apache.lenya.ac.ldap.LDAPUser" id="jafUA">
   <name>Jann Forrer</name>
   <description> </description>
   <email>jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch</email>
   <password type="md5"/>
   <groups/>
   <ldapid>ldapuserid</ldapid>
</identity>

In the GUI only the id is shown. 
I changed 
- lenya/xslt/admin/users/overview.xsl
- lenya/content/admin/users/overview.xsp
so that the LDAPid is also shown in a users profile.
